typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_Id} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> srcComments
srcComments alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> upsert
upsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> dstComment
